a line connecting Maric and Steve, he drew a line connecting Maric and Jason.
He then drew a line connecting Jason and Tyre.
Klein watched the scene unfold before his eyes in silence.
At this moment, Wraith Tyre suddenly appeared at the scene, reappearing in front of Maric.
Wraith Steve, who was hiding in the shadows at the top of the warehouse, also emerged.
"Sharron! Wraith Steve is here!"
At the same time, Jason's arm was caught by the invisible tentacles, and he was dragged into the void.
The strange tentacles were nowhere to be seen, but when Wraith Steve appeared, a new set of tentacles emerged from his hands.
They were made of a dark-green material, but the babies' faces were pale white.
The tentacles seemed to be moving independently, but they didn't make any sounds.
The tentacles that protruded from the babies' faces were the ones that seemed to be feeling the most pain.
"Wraith Steve, do you feel any pain? Do you feel any pain?"
The babies' faces were glowing with a light that was similar to the moon's. Their eyes were closed, but they seemed to be staring at something.
"Wraith Steve,

the Scarlet Lunar Corona, he took out a small, round, and flat metallic object. It was a key, and it was very heavy. Its handle was made of gold.
Klein knew that he had no chance of defeating Wraith Steve by fighting. But he knew that the key to defeating him was the All-Black Eye.
He had used the All-Black Eye many times to save his friends and allies. He had used it to save Steve himself, and it was now his only hope.

Summary:

A group of individuals, including Maric, Jason, and others, are engaged in a tense confrontation involving supernatural entities and mystical artifacts. The atmosphere is fraught with danger, and the outcome remains uncertain as the characters grapple with their desires, powers, and the consequences of their actions. The narrative unfolds with suspense and intrigue, highlighting the struggle for control and survival in a world where the supernatural and the unknown play a significant role.
